item.title: RangeShifter 2.0
item.description: The RangeShifter platform was first published in Bocedi et al. (2014) and new functionality was added in Bocedi et al.

item.title: RangeShiftR
item.description: We here introduce the new RangeshiftR package, which makes RangeShifter available from within R (Malchow et al.
